# Website Optimization Changes
## Date: December 15, 2025
## Issues Fixed
### 1. Slow Loading Time ✅ **Problem:** Website takes a long time to load at the start.
**Solutions Implemented:**
#### a) JavaScript Loading Optimization - **File:** `layouts/index.html` - **Change:** Added `defer` attribute to all vendor JavaScript files - **Impact:** Scripts now load asynchronously without blocking page rendering - **Files affected:** - purecounter_vanilla.js - bootstrap.bundle.min.js - glightbox.min.js - swiper-bundle.min.js - typed.min.js - main.js
#### b) Image Lazy Loading - **Files:** `layouts/index.html` - **Change:** Added `loading="lazy"` attribute to all images - **Impact:** Images load only when they're about to enter the viewport - **Images optimized:** - About section profile image - All project images - All blog article images - Blog author avatars
#### c) Improved Alt Text - Added descriptive alt text to all images for better accessibility and SEO - Example: Changed `alt=""` to `alt="Younes Belouche"` or `alt="{{ .Title }}"`
#### d) Faster Preloader Removal - **File:** `static/js/main.js` - **Change:** Modified preloader to remove on DOMContentLoaded instead of full window load - **Impact:** Preloader disappears much faster, improving perceived performance - **Added:** Smooth fade-out transition (300ms)
#### e) Preloader CSS Transition - **File:** `static/css/style.css` - **Change:** Added `transition: opacity 0.3s ease;` to #preloader - **Impact:** Smooth fade-out effect instead of abrupt disappearance
---
### 2. Projects Not Showing on Mobile ✅ **Problem:** Projects section doesn't display properly on mobile devices.
**Solutions Implemented:**
#### a) Responsive Grid Classes - **File:** `layouts/index.html` - **Change:** Updated project cards from `col-md-4` to `col-12 col-sm-6 col-md-4` - **Impact:** - Mobile (< 576px): 1 column (full width) - Tablets (≥ 576px): 2 columns - Desktop (≥ 768px): 3 columns
#### b) Enhanced CSS for Mobile Responsiveness - **File:** `static/css/style.css` - **Changes:** ```css /* Mobile: Full width */ #work .col-12 { width: 100%; padding: 0 0.25rem; }
/* Small screens (tablets): 2 columns */ @media (min-width: 576px) { #work .col-sm-6 { width: calc(50% - 0.25rem); padding: 0 0.25rem; } }
/* Medium screens and up: 3 columns */ @media (min-width: 768px) { #work .col-md-4 { width: calc(33.333% - 0.333rem); padding: 0 0.25rem; } } ``` - **Impact:** Projects now display correctly on all screen sizes
#### c) Blog Section Responsive Update - **File:** `layouts/index.html` - **Change:** Updated blog cards from `col-md-4` to `col-12 col-sm-6 col-md-4` - **Impact:** Blog articles now also display properly on mobile devices with the same responsive behavior
#### d) Reduced Margin Bottom - **File:** `static/css/style.css` - **Change:** Reduced `.work-box` margin-bottom from 3rem to 1.5rem - **Impact:** Better spacing on mobile devices, more content visible above the fold
---
## Performance Improvements Summary
### Before: - ❌ JavaScript blocks page rendering - ❌ All images load immediately (even off-screen ones) - ❌ Preloader waits for all resources to load - ❌ Projects invisible on mobile - ❌ Blog cards overflow on mobile
### After: - ✅ JavaScript loads asynchronously with `defer` - ✅ Images lazy-load as user scrolls - ✅ Preloader removes on DOM ready with smooth transition - ✅ Projects display in responsive grid (1/2/3 columns) - ✅ Blog cards responsive on all devices - ✅ Better perceived performance - ✅ Improved SEO with descriptive alt text - ✅ Better accessibility
---
## Files Modified
1. **layouts/index.html** - Added responsive grid classes (col-12 col-sm-6 col-md-4) - Added lazy loading to all images - Added defer attribute to all scripts - Improved alt text for accessibility
2. **static/css/style.css** - Added mobile-responsive CSS for portfolio section - Added media queries for tablets and desktop - Added transition to preloader - Optimized spacing for mobile
3. **static/js/main.js** - Optimized preloader removal timing - Added smooth fade-out effect - Changed from window load to DOMContentLoaded
4. **public/css/style.css** (auto-generated from static/) 5. **public/js/main.js** (auto-generated from static/)
---
## Testing Recommendations
1. **Mobile Testing:** - Test on actual mobile devices (< 576px width) - Verify projects show in single column - Check blog articles display correctly
2. **Tablet Testing:** - Test on tablets (576px - 768px width) - Verify 2-column layout for projects and blog
3. **Desktop Testing:** - Test on desktop (≥ 768px width) - Verify 3-column layout maintained
4. **Performance Testing:** - Use Chrome DevTools Lighthouse - Check Time to First Byte (TTFB) - Verify First Contentful Paint (FCP) - Test on slow 3G connection
5. **Image Loading:** - Scroll through page and verify images load as they come into view - Check Network tab in DevTools to confirm lazy loading
---
## Additional Optimization Recommendations (Future)
1. **Image Optimization:** - Convert images to WebP format for better compression - Generate responsive image sizes with srcset - Compress existing images
2. **CSS Optimization:** - Minify CSS files - Remove unused CSS - Consider critical CSS inlining
3. **JavaScript Optimization:** - Consider removing unused vendor libraries - Minify JavaScript files if not already minified
4. **Caching:** - Add proper cache headers - Implement service worker for offline support
5. **CDN:** - Consider using CDN for vendor libraries - Use CDN for static assets
---
## Build Command
To rebuild the site after making changes: ```bash cd /home/younes/WebstormProjects/dombroks.github.io hugo ```
The changes are now live in the `public/` directory and ready for deployment.
